content:
Leiden Institute of Advanced Computer Science currently has three positions opened for applications. Please share with anyone who would be interested.

Assistant Professor in computer systems :
https://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en/vacancies/2019/q3/19-403-assistant-professor-in-computer-systems
Full Professor in Imaging and Visualisation :
https://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en/vacancies/2019/q3/19-366-full-professor-in-imaging-and-visualisation
Full Professor in Deep Learning Foundations :
https://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en/vacancies/2019/q3/19-365-full-professor-in-deep-learning-foundations
Thanks, Marie! I think this should go under positions/academia, though.
